name: Dog Paw Cleaner Cup
imageAlt: Portable dog paw cleaner cup with soft silicone bristles for muddy paw washing
shortDescription: Clean muddy paws in seconds before they hit your pristine floors.
description: Singapore's rain showers mean muddy paws are a daily reality for dog owners. This portable paw cleaner cup lets you gently wash and dry each paw in seconds â€” just dip, twist, and done. The soft silicone bristles reach between paw pads without irritating sensitive skin, keeping your home spotless after every walk.
features: Soft silicone bristles clean gently between paw pads
One-hand twist operation makes cleaning quick and easy
Removable bristle core for thorough rinsing after use
Compact size fits in your walking bag or by the front door
Suitable for small to medium dogs with paws up to 7cm wide
